Sentencas: Interactions between the metal interconnect and glass sealant in the solid oxide cells stack are critical to retaining the system integrity.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: To address this issue, in the current study, 8YSZ coating is applied on the Crofer22 APU steel via sol-gel and dip-coating method.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Dense and continuous 8YSZ coatings are obtained on Crofer22 APU substrates.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction and Raman spectroscopy results show that both cubic and tetragonal structures of 8YSZ are formed.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: A glass-based sealing paste is applied on bare and 8YSZ coated Crofer22 APU steel.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The interfacial compatibility and chemical stability of steel/glass and steel/8YSZ/glass joint couples are investigated using SEM and EDS line scan analysis after the sealing process as well as 1000 h (10 thermal cycles) aging at 800 degrees C in air atmospheres.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Very good compatibility is found between the coated steel and the glass.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: No significant interactions, cracks formation, or failure are observed at both steel/8YSZ and 8YSZ/glass interfaces, suggesting that the YSZ protective layer can effectively act as a barrier to interdiffusion of metal and glass elements.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Finite element analysis shows that the generated residual stresses in the presence of the coating layer are not significant to be detrimental for the examined interfaces.
Titulo: Effect of YSZ sol-gel coating on interaction of Crofer22 APU with sealing glass for solid oxide fuel/electrolysis cell
